const [countries, setCountries] = React.useState( appsmith.model.countries?.length ? appsmith.model.countries : countryList ); const [selected, setSelected] = React.useState(appsmith.model.selected || ""); React.useEffect(() => { appsmith.onModelChange((model, prevModel) => { if (JSON.stringify(model.countries) !== JSON.stringify(prevModel?.countries)) { setCountries(model.countries.length ? model.countries : countryList); } if (model.selected !== prevModel?.selected) { setSelected(model.selected); } }); }, []); const handleChange = React.useCallback((e) => { const value = e.target.value; setSelected(value); appsmith.triggerEvent("onSelect", value); }, []); return (

); } appsmith.onReady(() => { ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById("root")); });
